title: Home

2.title: How do you feel around new people?

options.introvert: I tend to be quiet and observe at first
options.extrovert: I easily start conversations and open up quickly
options.ambivert: Somewhere in between, depends on the situation

3.title: How do you prefer spending time with a partner?

options.closeness_seeker: I love staying in, being cozy and connected
options.activity_seeker: I enjoy action, new experiences and going out
options.both_seeker: Both are important, depending on the phase

options.structured: I like structure, plans and reliability
options.free_spirited: I’m spontaneous and love going with the flow

5.title: How would you describe your role in a relationship?

options.harmony: I’m more calm, balanced, and follow the lead
options.dominance: I bring energy and like to take the lead
